#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  cin.tie(0);
  int denominations[1005];
  int n, temp, i, max = 0, denom;
  cin >> n;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    denominations[i] = 0;
  }
  for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    cin >> temp;
    denominations[temp-1]++;
  }
  for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    if(denominations[i] > max){
      max = denominations[i];
      denom = i;
    }
  }
  cout << denom + 1 << "\n" << max;
	return 0;
}
